title: connection error
body:
recently i had some problems with the new client.
From time to time in champselect i would disconect and be unable to chose a champion (only started happening witch the new client and only in champselect). Is there any way to solve this problem (kinde annoying because it makes dodge ranked games, recently in a promo serie)

replies.body: The legacy and updated clients are separate applications, so your network settings may not be the same for both.  It does sounds annoying, but our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help fix this up.  Just be sure to test it in a custom first to prevent any penalties, and run through each step to rule out any possibilities.  I hope that helps!
